reviewText: Lyons is a very good teacher.  Good quality tape, great teacher, great if you plan to spar in tournaments.  The techniques are realistic.

This video teaches you how to spar in a Karate tournament, how to understand the unique techniques of the various styles of Karate and gain an advantage using Robert Lyons' suggestions.  He shows his techniques  against a Karate Black Belt and explains the mechanics behind each  technique.  Many angles are used so you can see what is going on.
